VariableDescription.Name: CU
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Local Auroral Electrojet index, Upper bound, CU
VariableDescription.Header:

#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     CANOPUS>Canadian Auroral Network Open Program Unified Study
#     DATA_TYPE                       K0>Key Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MARI>Magnetometer and Riometer Array

#     TITLE                           MARI Magnetometer Key Parameter Data 18-Aug-1994
#     TEXT                            Magnetic Field Extrema and Location
#                                     References: 1.Rostoker, G., Samson, J.C., Creutzberg, F., Hughes, T.J.,
#                                     McDiarmid, D.R., McNamara, A.G., Vallance Jones, A., Wallis, D.D.,
#                                     Cogger, L.L.; CANOPUS - a ground based instrument array for remote sensing the
#                                     high latitude ionosphere during the ISTP/GGS program,
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., submitted for publication, 1993.
#     MODS                            Created 19-AUG-1994
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0119
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 CN_K0_MARI_19940818_V01

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      CANOPUS MARI Magnetometer Key Parameters
#     PI_NAME                         J. Samson
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Alberta
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Ground-Based Investigations
#                                     !___ITM Data including Earth Imaging and Ground-Based
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ground-Based Magnetometers, Riometers, Sounders
#                                     Activity Indices
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              CANOPUS_MARI_Key-Parameters-K0_1min_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. Local Auroral Electrojet index, Upper bound, CU
#       NOTES:  Local equivalent to AU index, but computed from magnetic field perturbations measured at specific stations of the CANOPUS array
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 19:12:26 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Local equivalent to AU index, but computed from magnetic field perturbations measured at specific stations of the CANOPUS array
#
EPOCH                     EJET_UP,_CU
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms             nT
01-09-1992 00:00:00.000       89.3400
